wikipedia_page.main: Albert Martin was a Scottish sailor and Olympic Champion. He competed for the Royal Clyde Yacht Club at the 1908 Summer Olympics at Hunters Quay, and won a gold medal in the 12 metre class.He was a crew member of the Scottish boat Hera, which won the gold medal in the 12 metre class.
